mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name,code, price, description, category_id, create_at, update_at) VALUES ( #{name},#{code}, #{price}, #{description}, #{category.id}, #{createAt}, #{updateAt});
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, price= #{price}, description= #{description}, category_id=#{category.id}, update_at=#{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.price, p.description, p.category_id AS categoryId, p.create_at AS createAt, p.update_at AS updateAt FROM product p WHERE (#{categoryId} IS NULL OR #{categoryId} = 0 OR p.category_id = #{categoryId}) AND (#{keyword} IS NULL OR CONCAT(IFNULL(p.name, ''), IFNULL(p.code, '')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'));
SELECT id , name, code, price, description, category_id as categoryId, create_at as createAt, update_at as updateAt FROM product WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT p.id , p.name, p.code, p.price, p.description, p.create_at as createAt, p.update_at as updateAt FROM product WHERE category_id = #{categoryId};
